channel.title: Everytime i try to add my server to status list, my servers offline? wtf!
channel.description:
I'm trying to add my server to the ONLINE status list, so others can join, and play with me.
Can someone help me figure out what this problem is? I've done the following:
I've filled in all of the information, when i'm trying to register my server on the status list.
I've made a no-ip, and i'm using that ip.
I've port-forwarded, and unblocked all ports in my firewall.
My server is currently running, and has been for nearly an hour, and i can access it via; silabs client.
Why does it say my server must be online when i try to register it on the status checker?!
I keep getting the same pathetic message.
Help needed, thank you.

item.title: Everytime i try to add my server to status list, my servers offline? wtf!
item.dc:creator: @hooba hooba
item.description:
@hooba wrote:

I’ve already portforwarded…

Using a linksys; wrt54g router.

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 18, 2008, 09:49:28 am[/size][hr]meh… thanks for helping guys… i think i’ma call it quits, and just give up on mopar alltogether… i’ve port-forwarded, but either, i did it wrong, or im missing something else. Well… you all take it easy. have fun with mopar.

Read full topic

@Rog3r wrote:

Then your server is not online, and therefore port forward

item.source: Everytime i try to add my server to status list, my servers offline? wtf!

item.title: Everytime i try to add my server to status list, my servers offline? wtf!
item.dc:creator: @hooba hooba
item.description:
@hooba wrote:

Omg rofl… you guys obviously don’t understand…

Mk First off.
I go to this link

http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php

Then i scroll down.

“Click here to register your own server.”

I click on that.

Name: Reapage Scape V2
Ip: hooba-scape.no-ip.biz
Password:
Password:

Info: This is just Reapage-scape v2, except i’m hosting it for you all to play on.

Skill
Pk
Buy/sell
Do whatever you’d like.

No massing, or permanent ip ban.

I will be giving “FREE” Admin, and mod spots to people who deserve them.

Random drop parties will be held, along with free cash.

Do NOT beg, or i will get irriated quickly, trust me.

Rules are, but are NOT limited to;

  1. No massing
  2. No spamming
  3. No irriating other players.
  4. No begging for items, cash, staff spots.
  5. Have fun, and enjoy yourself.

ALL CREDITS, I REPEATL; “ALL CREDITS” Go directly to ‘The Reaper’

Thanks again for the amazing source, i love it.

I type all of that in, correct?

I press submit, and this is what it says.

"The server Reapage Scape V2 is offline, it must be online before you can register it "

Read full topic

item.title: Everytime i try to add my server to status list, my servers offline? wtf!
item.dc:creator: @hooba hooba
item.description:
@hooba wrote:

Logging into the server is not the problem… I can’t get it to go onto the server status list… So others can see it. I can log into it perfectly, and i’ve been playing it for over an hour now… I just want others to be able to aswell.

Read full topic

item.title: Everytime i try to add my server to status list, my servers offline? wtf!
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Also, if it is your server, you cannot connect to your server using your IP, you can only do it on 127.0.0.1

Yep, possitive. I honestly don’t see why it says that my server is offline, and that it must be online for me to add it. Maybe there’s something i’m missing, but if you can think of anything, help would be greatly appreciated… I just want my server to be seen by others, so we can play together.
